attributes.action: Bethesda to offer refunds to all that wasted money buying Fallout 76
attributes.additional_details: This is not an expansion just restricting gamers that don't subscribe. Seems like they are treating this as a free to play game which it isn't (yet)
attributes.background: Bethesda have now started a premium subscription service cost £12.99 per month. This means all the people who brought the apparent full version of the game will not have access to all the game features unless they subscribe.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
